Html:
Death Knights seem to be flagged as Paladins when it comes to finding gear that they can wear.

The Rotation viewer is bugged.  Set rotations cannot be changed and disease uptime is listed as 1%, custom rotations cause the program to crash.

As far as rotations go, with the changes to the Blood tree the new "cookie cutter" seems to be 51/2/18 which drops Obliterate for Death Strike, convieniently enough Death Strike is not listed anywhere in the Rotation Viewer or the DPS Breakdown chart.  So, when fully raid buffed with that spec Rawr has me coming in on Overall DPS at a paltry 2300.
Disregard this post - user error... didnt check the rotation options ... assumed that if I selected a frost build the app would recognise a frost rotation was required
Where can I actually set up a rotation in the DPSDK model?
You no longer set your own rotation in DPSDK.  It is set automatically/optimally depending on your talents.

Then how am I supposed to accurately model a 51/13/7 build that includes Obliterate in the rotation?

 

Any tips?
I'm sorry, where did you say you come from?  Patch 3.1?  Obliterate as Blood is out.  I don't know why you'd want to try to model it.
